ComicInfo.Summary:
SynopsisEDDIE NEALE finally tastes FREEDOM! Will he escape the grip of NAZI TYRANNY at last, only to be TRAPPED on a trajectory to fulfill an ancient PROPHECY? There's no going back NOW! He may not be able to save himself, but if VICTORIOUS...he might just save the WORLD!
PlotThe Nazis are taking the lifeless body of Sister Evangeline out of Eddie Neale's Solitary Confinement Cell 9, leaving the English prisoner to think about all the events that happened lately.
Eddie soon finds a secret passageway out of his cell into an underground cavern. There he finds a iron hammer and a cryptic message. Eddie doesn't have time to waste as the cave fills with water forcing him deeper.
Soon he emerges in the abandoned bell tower on the lake. As he climbs the stairs he finds himself under fire from the Nazis, who are battling a giant lake monster, and a undead and possessed Kommandant Von-Kleist. Eddie is able to outsmart the demon and the monster and ring the bell, using the iron hammer.
The bell tower, the monster and Eddie are sucked into the lake, leaving the Nazis confused and disbanded. Inside the Lungotz Luftzig, a phone rings and Mother Superior answers it and tells the Nazis general on the line, that they will be meeting their makers soon enough.
